name: Closest To Zero
description:
Tutorial (Important): 

Welcome to Closest to Zero, in this game you have to win a tournament, the tournament is based on pressing a button whenever you feel 

that the time is closest to zero, but there is a problem, at the start of each round the time is going to be set, but throughout the 

round the time is going to be invisible, maybe giving you a hard time trying to win the match. The first player in the match that

obtains two points will be the winner. Could you win this tournament?

Controls: (LEFT CLICK TO PRESS THE BUTTOM)

Art / Programming: Windigos

Sounds: Packs from https://freesound.org. 

Software: Unity Engine and Inkscape.
